## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Automating Galaxy workflows using the command line](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/galaxy-interface/tutorials/workflow-automation/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
